mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_pre_deposit_log (create_time, change_money, remarks, change_type, store_id, operator_id, operator_type, operator_ip, order_number, balance, detail_reason, transfer_time, merchant_order_number, change_type_desc) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{changeMoney}, #{remarks}, #{changeType}, #{storeId}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorType}, #{operatorIp}, #{orderNumber}, #{balance}, #{detailReason}, #{transferTime}, #{merchantOrderNumber}, #{changeTypeDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT l.id, s.store_name, s.store_code, c.name city, s.store_type, l.create_time, l.change_money, l.remarks, l.change_type, l.order_number, l.balance, l.transfer_time, l.merchant_order_number, l.operator_id, l.operator_type, l.operator_ip FROM st_pre_deposit_log l LEFT JOIN st_store s on l.store_id = s.store_id LEFT JOIN city c ON c.code = s.city_code WHERE l.id = #{id}
